alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 2:12PM CDT until May 09 at 7:37AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Commerce. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, moderate agricultural flooding occurs. Riverview Park experiences moderate flooding. State Highway 125 near the fairgrounds will be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
